4309740.name: Dash'n'Drops
4309740.description:
Deep within the Webbing Waves, lost souls fused into one. Persistence is the only way out.

Improve. Adapt. Update.

Dash'n'Drops fuses the ultra-precise controls of Platform-Fighters (Smash Bros, Rivals of Aether...) with the unpredictable progression of a modern Roguelite (Dead Cells, Hades...). Dive into the layers of the network to scavenge power, and emerge strong enough to strike down the seven entities locking the system.

Explore. Equip. Fight.

Build your own arsenal in a race against time before the final confrontation.

Features:

  • Visceral Platform Combat: Experience the feel of a competitive fighting game in a single-player adventure where every hit counts. Eject your enemies or drain their health bars with surgical precision.

  • Full Moveset Customization: Customize your entire moveset in real-time. Find, equip, and upgrade Diskettes to define your Smash attacks, Tilts, Aerials, and more. Every run offers a new combat signature.

  • Evolution: Optimize your core stats - Speed, Jump, Attack, Defense - and collect passive items to become an anomaly that the system can no longer contain.

  • The 7 Eternals: Test your build against the 7 Eternals, massive bosses corrupted to the core, designed to push your technical mastery and strategy to their absolute limits.

  • Hand-Drawn World: A world entirely drawn and animated by hand, imagined and created with care. Home-made guaranteed!

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
